title: Beautiful Bastard by Christina Lauren
description:

He never expected that the assistant whoÃ¢â‚¬â„¢d been helping him from abroad was the gorgeous, innocently provocative - completely infuriating - creature he now has to see every day. Despite the rumors, heÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s never been one for a workplace hookup. But ChloeÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s so tempting heÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s willing to bend the rules - or outright smash them - if it means he can have her. All over the office.

As their appetites for one another increase to a breaking point, Bennett and Chloe must decide exactly what theyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re willing to lose in order to win each other. Originally only available online as The Office by tby789 - and garnering over two million reads on fan-fiction sites - Beautiful Bastard has been extensively updated for rerelease.
